title: Keegan Swenson Battles for the Fastest Known Time at White Rim Trail
content: Fastest Known Time (FKT) attempts have become a pandemic special. When the normal schedule of bike racing is either put on hold or thinned out, many pros look to whet their whistle taking on their own psyche. Keegan Swenson returns to the White Rim Trail to beat the FKT in this video.
author: prolly
